reminder.sendReminderDesc: Send a payment reminder to the client
reminder.emailDefaultBodySv:
Hi,

This is a friendly reminder that invoice #{number} for {total} kr was due on {dueDate}, which is now {daysOverdue} days overdue.

We kindly ask that payment be made at your earliest convenience.

Bank account: {bankAccount}
Please reference invoice #{number} when making payment.

The invoice is attached for your convenience.

Best regards,
{company}
reminder.emailDefaultBodyEn:
Dear Sir/Madam,

This is a friendly reminder that invoice #{number} for {total} was due on {dueDate}, which is now {daysOverdue} days overdue.

We kindly ask that payment be made at your earliest convenience.

Bank account: {bankAccount}
Please reference invoice #{number} when making payment.

The invoice is attached for your convenience.

Best regards,
{company}

settings.calendarAutoUpdate: The calendar updates automatically. The update interval is controlled by your calendar app (typically 15 min - 24 hours).
settings.subscriptionDesc: Manage your plan and upgrade to Pro
settings.aiUsageDesc: Overview of AI costs for receipt scanning and document classification

settings.aiUsageHint: AI is used when scanning receipts or importing documents
settings.aiPricing: Pricing: Claude 3.5 Haiku $0.80/1M input, $4.00/1M output tokens. Text-based parsing is cheaper than image analysis.

settings.latePaymentExample: Late payment interest of 10% will be charged after due date
settings.platformEmailInfo: Invoices are sent via Amida. No additional settings needed.
